title: {LFP} Precision Gaming Red Available Positions [Serious Team] [Plat 1-Plat 5] [More Info Inside]
body:
Introduction

Hello there. My name is Hughie and I am the founder of all the Precision Gaming teams in the Dexterity Gaming organization.
Dexterity Gaming is an organization that consists of gaming communities for (League of Legends and Overwatch)
Not only do they own League of Legends teams, but sponsor the Precision Gaming tournament.
We decided to collab with Dexterity Gaming and use their Team speak server.

Precision Gaming Red

A League of Legends team that is owned by Dexterity Gaming.
All players are platinum and platinum only.
Practice daily and scrim other teams.
Play Ranked Team 5v5s and 3v3s.
Compete in online amateur lcs style tournaments.
Have coaches and a manager.
(More information can be found on our website)

Precision Gaming Black Black Available Positions

Currently we are looking for a top laner, mid laner and subs.
Here is the roster as of now:

Top Lane:
Jungle: calebneedle10
Mid Lane:
AD Carry:
Support: Vibes Killa
Sub: Rephresh
Sub:

Precision Gaming Red Player Requirements

Must be the rank of Platinum 1 - Platinum 5.
Must be dedicated and serious.
Must be active on a day-to-day basis or every other day.
Must main their role.
Must be willing to take criticism and work with the team.
Must be able to play what the team needs.
Must make practice when scheduled and tournament games.
Must have Team speak downloaded.
Must fill out the application below.

Precision Gaming Black Application

Name:
IGN:
Role:
Rank:
Main Champions:
Strengths:
Weaknesses:
Availability (Schedule):
Past Experiences:
Reason why you want to join:
Have Team speak downloaded:

Precision Gaming Red Tryouts

The Team Captain will add you in game and play one Summoner's Rift Draft Pick 5v5 (Duo)
If the Team Captain is impressed with the tryout's performance he will invite them to a
Summoner's Rift Ranked Draft Pick 5v5 with the rest of the team.
From there the Team Captain will message the tryout. (No later than one day)
And tell them their results.

Thank you for your possible application.
Applying for the team does not grant you the spot.
(Do not apply if you are not applying for the positions available and if you do not meet the requirements)

More Available Positions

Currently the PG Championship Series needs more staff members before it kicks off.

replies.body:
Name: Dre
IGN: I Cheat
Role: I Can play all 3 Well
Rank: P4
Main Champions: My champ pool is pretty big in the mid and adc roles, but top is mao, trundle, irel 
Strengths: decision making lategame (shotcalling)
Weaknesses: playing around side lanes getting a lot of jungle pressure
Availability (Schedule): all the time , i stream and make YT vids so i'dprobably be uploading out games, i have tons of free tme
Past Experiences: I've played on many teams but they all flop
Reason why you want to join: i like a more competitive environment
Have Team speak downloaded: yessir

Name: Kevin
IGN: Havvik
Role: Adc
Rank: P3
Main Champions: Jhin,Twitch,Lucian,Caitlyn
Strengths: Willing to Take Critisism, Game Knowledge, Map Awarness, Mechanics
Weaknesses: Shotcalling
Availability (Schedule): Mon-Friday 6:00pm est till 1-2am Est, Sat-Sunday I am available whenever
Past Experiences: nothing on a serious level
Reason why you want to join: new to the game, but rapidly improving and looking to take my league to a higher level, very competitive
Have Team speak downloaded: Yes

Name: Peter
IGN: The Giratina
Role: Top
Rank: Platinum 4
Main Champions: Darius, Pantheon, Shen
Strengths: Team oriented and flexible/adaptable 
Weaknesses: Shotcalling 
Availability (Schedule): 4:00 pm - 10/11 pm EST on weekdays, and 5 pm to 10/11 pm EST on Sat/Sun
Past Experiences: None. I have entered in a Solo Entry tournaments, but nothing on a serious level team. 
Reason why you want to join: Most of my friends are Mid-Gold to Low Silver, so trying to get serious in ranked has been a difficulty. 
Have Team speak downloaded: Yes

Name: Greg
IGN: Groglife
Role: Support/ADC
Rank: Platinum 4
Main Champions: Support is blitzcrank, thresh, karma, morgana; ADC is lucian, jinx, ezreal, miss fortune
Strengths: Shotcalling and map awareness
Weaknesses: Maintaining positivity in solo queue, something I've been working on for a while, but still is a weakness (I'm not toxic though, it's mostly a mental thing)
Availability (Schedule): I adjust to almost any schedule
Past Experiences: Was on a gold level ranked team in season 4 and 5
Reason why you want to join: I'd like to be on a more serious ranked team
Have Team speak downloaded: yes

Name: Carson
IGN: F4 KarePhree
Role: Mid
Rank: Plat 3
Main Champions: {{champion:112}} {{champion:268}} {{champion:41}} 
Strengths: Farm & Teamfight positioning
Weaknesses: Vision & keeping track of my opponent's sums
Availability (Schedule): 12:00 to 11:00 weekdays 12:00 to whenever
Past Experiences: Team for 4-5 months 
Reason why you want to join: Want to play competitively , climb ranks 
Have Team speak downloaded: Yea
